name: Sprungus Sprint
description:
A head to head local-multiplayer game where one player is a sproutling and the other is a shroomling. Battle your friends by covering more ground than them in this fast-paced Sprungus Sprint

- Manage your water meter or suffer the consequences

- Pick up power-ups which can aid you in your competition to plant as fast as possible

- Multiple obstacles stand in your way as you try to sabotage and plant

BEAT YOUR FRIENDS.

Power-Ups:

Water Drop - Replenishes Water Meter

Fertilizer - Gets Rid of Water Drainage

Bee - Increases Sprout Movement Speed

Apple - Doubles the Fungi Size

Developers:

Naimad Adrec - Programmer

Munamused - Artist/UI Programmer

Nikman - Programmer

Credits: 

Music:

ben_burnes - Three Red Hearts (Abstraction)

For Global Game Jam 2023
